about_the_game:
"Chrotopia" is a 2D action-adventure game set in a monochrome world. Players will explore diverse environments, interact with various characters, and uncover the mysteries hidden within this fading land.

The game blends fast-paced action with an engaging adventure narrative. Players take control of Kuro, a young girl searching for her missing sister. Along the way, she is joined by Rain, a kind-hearted girl who offers her support. Together, they encounter both allies and enemies as they strive to restore color and life to the world.

Gameplay features include precise platforming mechanics such as jumping, attacking, and gliding to navigate obstacles and battle formidable foes. Players will also experience a compelling story through character interactions and dialogue-driven events. With its mix of combat, exploration, and storytelling, "Chrotopia" offers a unique and immersive journey.
